simonoto-com.name: Simonoto.com
simonoto-com.notes: GitHub Pages site. Python build system (build.py + content.json). Portfolio/main website.

eeveelution.name: Eeveelution
eeveelution.notes: Single-file PWA (index.html) deployed to Firebase Hosting. JRPG chat wrapper for OpenClaw via WSS. Firebase SDK 11.4.0.

professor-of-funk.name: Professor of Funk
professor-of-funk.notes: Music education platform. Firebase Hosting. Separate from simonoto.com.

bonito-express.name: Bonito Express
bonito-express.notes: Japan trip planning app. React via CDN + Firebase Realtime DB. Currently hosted as sub-path of simonoto.com.
